subject: RE: [junit] Build new junit.jar
msgSnippet: Well, I haven t tried the build.xml on Junit 3.7, but it probably works. Or, you could just write one of your own.  It s pretty simple. =jason [:question |
messageBody:
Well, I haven't tried the build.xml on Junit 3.7, but it probably works.
Or, you could just write one of your own. It's pretty simple.

=jason
[:question | ^One]

To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [junit] Build new junit.jar


Actually not... because it does not appear to be in the junit 3.7
release...
I just checked out 3.8.1 and it does have the build.xml in the src.jar.
Not sure why it is not in the 3.7?

thanks,
johnj
